2123.subject: TAT
2123.descrlong: Demystifies the process of compositing, or creating special effects for film and video by combining images from different sources - such as live-action digital video, digitized film, computer generated 3-D, 2-D animations, painted backdrops, digital still photographs, and text.  Topics inlcude color keying, rotoscoping, matte painting, motion tracking, and lighting.
